description: Enhances stealth capabilities and optimizes tracking device controller performance.
author: CipherTech Industries

features.description: Improved cloaking algorithms for enhanced invisibility to detection systems.
Advanced anomaly recognition to avoid detection by counter-tracking technologies.
Upgrade to 256-bit AES encryption for secure communication between controller and tracking devices.
Randomized IP address generation to thwart attempts at device triangulation.
Intelligent noise generation to mimic normal background signals and confuse tracking algorithms.
Added self-destruct fail-safe protocol to protect sensitive information in case of compromise.
